channel.title: Customize email notifications :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Customize email notifications Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Pull the “Use Velocity Templating Language” section out of this document into a new VTL reference doc. See reference for more details. Links to original docs: - Customize email notifications:https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/custom-email/main/ Why is this here?: Based on GroupIt data from Oktane, customers struggled to understand VTL. As a result, a new separate VLT overview doc is being proposed.
